meanings.sent1: She outprayed her friend during their evening prayers.
meanings.sent2: He outprayed everyone in the congregation with his heartfelt prayers.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outprayed her brother, hoping for more dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her devotion outprayed any doubts that lingered in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The monk's peaceful aura outprayed the chaos of the city streets.

meanings.sent1: She outprayed for hours last night, seeking guidance.
meanings.sent2: He outprayed every day last week for his family's well-being.
meanings.sent3: The cat outprayed for extra treats, looking up with big eyes.
meanings.sent4: His faith outprayed any obstacles that came his way.
meanings.sent5: The old church bells outprayed the silence of the night.
